metadata.title: CVE-2023-49093 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: HtmlUnit is a GUI-less browser for Java programs. HtmlUnit is vulnerable toRemote Code Execution (RCE) via XSTL, when browsing the attackerâ€™s webpage.This vulnerability has been patched in version 3.9.0

criterions.comment: htmlunit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
